content: Prof. Dr. Stefan Milius - Lehrstuhl für Informatik 8 (Theoretische Informatik) Organisationsmenü öffnen Organisationsmenü schließen Friedrich-Alexander-Universität Lehrstuhl für Informatik 8 (Theoretische Informatik) Prof. Dr. Stefan Milius Prof. Dr. Stefan Milius Phone: +49 (0)9131 / 85 64058 Email: stefan [dot] milius [at] fau [dot] de Address: Friedrich-Alexander Universität Erlangen-NürnbergLehrstuhl für Informatik 8 (Theoretische Informatik)Martensstr. 3D-91058 Erlangen Room: 11.152 About Me I am a Senior Lecturer (german: Akademischer Direktor) at the Chair for Theoretical Computer Science of FAU Erlangen-Nürnberg. Research Publications My research interests include: coalgebras and their application in computer science semantics of iteration and recursion universal algebra and category theory logic and formal verification of systems Awards Best Theory Paper at FM 2019 for „Generic Partition Refinement and Weighted Tree Automata“ (with H.-P. Deifel, L. Schröder and T. Wißmann) EATCS Best Paper Award at MFCS 2017 for „Eilenberg Theorems for Free“ (with J. Adamek and H. Urbat) CALCO 2015 Best Paper Award for „Syntactic Monoids in a Category“ (with J. Adamek and H. Urbat) Ackermann Award 2006 for my PhD thesis.
